extension.summary: Quantum - Video Add-on Just another Video add-on written by a lazy fella who wants to watch things online
extension.description: In the future, it should provide a centralized option for watching Movies, TV Shows and Animes (and whatever else) via new modules. For now, it has only one provider (masteranime.es) for animes. But hey, it works for me so that is a win :).
